name: Quack Attack (SorenSprout)
description:
Play as a little ducky friend in this short but sweet top down experience!

Submission for #FletchFest hosted by FletchMakes

Controls:

WASD - movement

"J" - interact

"K" - attack (once attack is acquired)

This is my very first game project! Made using GB Studio.

I feel like I learned so much and I am looking forward to taking that knowledge and applying to further projects.

Credits

Many assets used are thanks to generous itch and Github community creators
